mapper.select: SELECT post_seq, post_title, post_content, post_time, update_date, like_count, view_count FROM post ORDER BY post_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_title, post_content, post_time, like_count, view_count) VALUES (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, NOW(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, update_date = NOW() WHERE post_seq = #{postSeq}
